named-query.name: EventSchedule.findByExhibitionCode
named-query.query: select o from EventSchedule o where o.exhibition.code=?1 order by dateFrom, dateTo

named-query.name: Exhibitor.findByExhibitionCode
named-query.query: select o from Exhibitor o where o.exhibition.code=?1 order by location

named-native-query.name: Speaker.findByExhibitionCode
named-native-query.query: SELECT s.* FROM speaker s, exhibition e WHERE s.exhibition=e.id AND e.code=?1 ORDER BY convert(s.name USING gbk)
